properties.areaDesc: Coastal waters from Deerfield Beach to Ocean Reef FL out 20 NM
properties.headline: Small Craft Advisory issued January 22 at 3:30AM EST until January 23 at 7:00AM EST by NWS Miami FL
properties.description:
* WHAT...For the Gale Warning, northwest winds 20 to 25 kt with
frequent gusts into gale force conditions and seas 10 to 15 feet
today. For the Small Craft Advisory, northeast winds 15 to 20 kt
with gusts up to 30 kt and seas 8 to 13 feet expected tonight.

* WHERE...Coastal waters from Deerfield Beach to Ocean Reef FL
out 20 NM.

* WHEN...For the Gale Warning, until 7 PM EST this evening. For
the Small Craft Advisory, from 7 PM this evening to 7 AM EST
Thursday.

* IMPACTS...Strong winds will cause hazardous seas which could
capsize or damage vessels and reduce visibility.
properties.instruction:
Mariners should alter plans to avoid these hazardous conditions.
Remain in port, seek safe harbor, alter course, and/or secure the
vessel for severe conditions.

A sudden onset of rough seas may cause hazardous conditions,
which may occur suddenly at jetties and inlets. These conditions
could catch boaters by surprise. Boaters should remain in port.

NWSheadline: GALE WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 PM EST THIS EVENING... ...SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 7 PM THIS EVENING TO 7 AM EST THURSDAY
